english.segment1: [Verse 1:]. Beautiful God. Laying Your majesty aside. You reached out in love to show me life. Lifted from darkness into light. Oh
english.segment2: [Verse 2:]. King for a slave. Trading Your righteousness for shame. Despite all my pride and foolish ways. Caught in Your infinite embrace. Oh
english.segment3: [Chorus 1:]. And I find myself here on my knees again. Caught up in grace like an avalanche. Nothing compares to this love love love. Burning in my heart
english.segment4: [Verse 3:]. Saviour and Friend. Breathing Your life into my heart. Your word is the lamp unto my path. Forever I'm humbled by Your love. Oh
english.segment5: [Bridge:]. Take my life. Take all that I am. With all that I am I will love You. Take my heart. Take all that I have. Jesus how I adore You
english.segment6: [Chorus 2:]. And I find myself here on my knees again. Caught up in grace like an avalanche. Nothing compare to this love love love.
